TokenFilterName TokenFilterName Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll

Defines the names of all token filters supported by Azure Search. https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/searchservice/Custom-analyzers-in-Azure-Search

Edit

In this Article

public sealed class TokenFilterName : ExtensibleEnum<TokenFilterName>, IEquatable<TokenFilterName>Public NotInheritable Class TokenFilterName
    Inherits ExtensibleEnum(Of TokenFilterName)
    Implements IEquatable(Of TokenFilterName)
Inheritance
ObjectObject
ExtensibleEnum<TokenFilterName>ExtensibleEnum(Of TokenFilterName)
TokenFilterNameTokenFilterName

Inherited Members

Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.ExtensibleEnum{Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.TokenFilterName}

System.Object

Equals(Object, Object)Equals(Object, Object)

GetType()GetType()
MemberwiseClone()MemberwiseClone()

Fields

Apostrophe Apostrophe

Edit

Strips all characters after an apostrophe (including the apostrophe itself). http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/tr/ApostropheFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName ApostrophePublic Shared ReadOnly Apostrophe As TokenFilterName

ArabicNormalization ArabicNormalization

Edit

A token filter that applies the Arabic normalizer to normalize the orthography. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/ar/ArabicNormalizationFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName ArabicNormalizationPublic Shared ReadOnly ArabicNormalization As TokenFilterName

AsciiFolding AsciiFolding

Edit

Converts alphabetic, numeric, and symbolic Unicode characters which are not in the first 127 ASCII characters (the "Basic Latin" Unicode block) into their ASCII equivalents, if such equivalents exist. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/ASCIIFoldingFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName AsciiFoldingPublic Shared ReadOnly AsciiFolding As TokenFilterName

CjkBigram CjkBigram

Edit

Forms bigrams of CJK terms that are generated from StandardTokenizer. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/cjk/CJKBigramFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName CjkBigramPublic Shared ReadOnly CjkBigram As TokenFilterName

CjkWidth CjkWidth

Edit

Normalizes CJK width differences. Folds fullwidth ASCII variants into the equivalent basic Latin, and half-width Katakana variants into the equivalent Kana. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/cjk/CJKWidthFilter.html 

public static readonly TokenFilterName CjkWidthPublic Shared ReadOnly CjkWidth As TokenFilterName

Classic Classic

Edit

Removes English possessives, and dots from acronyms. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/standard/ClassicFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName ClassicPublic Shared ReadOnly Classic As TokenFilterName

CommonGram CommonGram

Edit

Construct bigrams for frequently occurring terms while indexing. Single terms are still indexed too, with bigrams overlaid. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/commongrams/CommonGramsFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName CommonGramPublic Shared ReadOnly CommonGram As TokenFilterName

EdgeNGram EdgeNGram

Edit

Generates n-grams of the given size(s) starting from the front or the back of an input token. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/ngram/EdgeNGramTokenFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName EdgeNGramPublic Shared ReadOnly EdgeNGram As TokenFilterName

Elision Elision

Edit

Removes elisions. For example, "l'avion" (the plane) will be converted to "avion" (plane). http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/util/ElisionFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName ElisionPublic Shared ReadOnly Elision As TokenFilterName

GermanNormalization GermanNormalization

Edit

Normalizes German characters according to the heuristics of the German2 snowball algorithm. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/de/GermanNormalizationFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName GermanNormalizationPublic Shared ReadOnly GermanNormalization As TokenFilterName

HindiNormalization HindiNormalization

Edit

Normalizes text in Hindi to remove some differences in spelling variations. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/hi/HindiNormalizationFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName HindiNormalizationPublic Shared ReadOnly HindiNormalization As TokenFilterName

IndicNormalization IndicNormalization

Edit

Normalizes the Unicode representation of text in Indian languages. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/in/IndicNormalizationFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName IndicNormalizationPublic Shared ReadOnly IndicNormalization As TokenFilterName

KeywordRepeat KeywordRepeat

Edit

Emits each incoming token twice, once as keyword and once as non-keyword. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/KeywordRepeatFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName KeywordRepeatPublic Shared ReadOnly KeywordRepeat As TokenFilterName

KStem KStem

Edit

A high-performance kstem filter for English. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/en/KStemFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName KStemPublic Shared ReadOnly KStem As TokenFilterName

Length Length

Edit

Removes words that are too long or too short. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/LengthFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName LengthPublic Shared ReadOnly Length As TokenFilterName

Limit Limit

Edit

Limits the number of tokens while indexing. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/LimitTokenCountFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName LimitPublic Shared ReadOnly Limit As TokenFilterName

Lowercase Lowercase

Edit

Normalizes token text to lower case. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/core/LowerCaseFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName LowercasePublic Shared ReadOnly Lowercase As TokenFilterName

NGram NGram

Edit

Generates n-grams of the given size(s). http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/ngram/NGramTokenFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName NGramPublic Shared ReadOnly NGram As TokenFilterName

PersianNormalization PersianNormalization

Edit

Applies normalization for Persian. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/fa/PersianNormalizationFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName PersianNormalizationPublic Shared ReadOnly PersianNormalization As TokenFilterName

Phonetic Phonetic

Edit

Create tokens for phonetic matches. https://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-phonetic/org/apache/lucene/analysis/phonetic/package-tree.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName PhoneticPublic Shared ReadOnly Phonetic As TokenFilterName

PorterStem PorterStem

Edit

Uses the Porter stemming algorithm to transform the token stream. http://tartarus.org/~martin/PorterStemmer/

public static readonly TokenFilterName PorterStemPublic Shared ReadOnly PorterStem As TokenFilterName

Reverse Reverse

Edit

Reverses the token string. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/reverse/ReverseStringFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName ReversePublic Shared ReadOnly Reverse As TokenFilterName

ScandinavianFoldingNormalization ScandinavianFoldingNormalization

Edit

Folds Scandinavian characters åÅäæÄÆ->a and öÖøØ->o. It also discriminates against use of double vowels aa, ae, ao, oe and oo, leaving just the first one. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/ScandinavianFoldingFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName ScandinavianFoldingNormalizationPublic Shared ReadOnly ScandinavianFoldingNormalization As TokenFilterName

ScandinavianNormalization ScandinavianNormalization

Edit

Normalizes use of the interchangeable Scandinavian characters. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/ScandinavianNormalizationFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName ScandinavianNormalizationPublic Shared ReadOnly ScandinavianNormalization As TokenFilterName

Shingle Shingle

Edit

Creates combinations of tokens as a single token. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/shingle/ShingleFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName ShinglePublic Shared ReadOnly Shingle As TokenFilterName

Snowball Snowball

Edit

A filter that stems words using a Snowball-generated stemmer. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/snowball/SnowballFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName SnowballPublic Shared ReadOnly Snowball As TokenFilterName

SoraniNormalization SoraniNormalization

Edit

Normalizes the Unicode representation of Sorani text. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/ckb/SoraniNormalizationFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName SoraniNormalizationPublic Shared ReadOnly SoraniNormalization As TokenFilterName

Stemmer Stemmer

Edit

Language specific stemming filter. https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/searchservice/Custom-analyzers-in-Azure-Search#TokenFilters

public static readonly TokenFilterName StemmerPublic Shared ReadOnly Stemmer As TokenFilterName

Stopwords Stopwords

Edit

Removes stop words from a token stream. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/core/StopFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName StopwordsPublic Shared ReadOnly Stopwords As TokenFilterName

Trim Trim

Edit

Trims leading and trailing whitespace from tokens. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/TrimFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName TrimPublic Shared ReadOnly Trim As TokenFilterName

Truncate Truncate

Edit

Truncates the terms to a specific length. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/TruncateTokenFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName TruncatePublic Shared ReadOnly Truncate As TokenFilterName

Unique Unique

Edit

Filters out tokens with same text as the previous token. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/miscellaneous/RemoveDuplicatesTokenFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName UniquePublic Shared ReadOnly Unique As TokenFilterName

Uppercase Uppercase

Edit

Normalizes token text to upper case. http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_10_3/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/core/UpperCaseFilter.html

public static readonly TokenFilterName UppercasePublic Shared ReadOnly Uppercase As TokenFilterName

WordDelimiter WordDelimiter

Edit

Splits words into subwords and performs optional transformations on subword groups.

public static readonly TokenFilterName WordDelimiterPublic Shared ReadOnly WordDelimiter As TokenFilterName

Methods

Create(String) Create(String)

Edit

Creates a new TokenFilterName instance, or returns an existing instance if the given name matches that of a known token filter.

public static TokenFilterName Create(string name)Public Shared Function Create(name As String) As TokenFilterName
Parameters
name
String String

Name of the token filter.

Returns
TokenFilterName TokenFilterName

A TokenFilterName instance with the given name.

Operators

Implicit(String to TokenFilterName) Widening(String to TokenFilterName)

Edit

Defines implicit conversion from string to TokenFilterName.

public static implicit operator TokenFilterName(string name)Public Shared Widening Operator CType(name As String) As TokenFilterName
Parameters
name
String String

string to convert.

Returns
TokenFilterName TokenFilterName

The string as a TokenFilterName.
